entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 8:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: E 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
